verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What can’t you do
What won’t you do
Nothing Impossible
Nothing Impossible
What can’t you do
What won’t you do
Nothing Impossible with our God
[Chorus]
You do not LIE
You do not FAIL
What is hard for you to DO
It doesn’t exist oh
It can never, ever exist oh
You do not LIE
You do not FAIL
What is hard for you to DO
It doesn’t exist oh
It can never, ever exist oh
[Verse 2]
According to your Knowledge
And your will for Me
What you say, you have Done
I just need to Align Oh
Because you are not a Man
That changes your Mind oh
Those that know you will Trust in You
Not in Horses and Chariots
By the Arm of Flesh
No Man can Prevail
[Pre-Chorus]
No man, no man
No man, no man
My Confidence is you
What is Hard, what is hard for you
It can never, ever exist oh
[Chorus]
You do not LIE, You do not FAIL
What is hard for you to DO
It doesn’t exist oh
It can never, ever exist oh
You do not LIE, You do not FAIL
What is hard for you to DO
It doesn’t exist oh
It can never, ever exist oh
[Verse 3]
Those that know you
Will Trust in You
Not in Horses and Chariots
By the Arm of Flesh
No Man can Prevail
Ask Abraham and Sarah
And the Woman with the Issue of Blood
Nothing, nothing hard for you
(Ask Mama Hannah)
Ask Mama Hannah
Blind Bartimaeus,
Make you go ask the Israelites
Absolutely nothing Hard for you
[Pre-Chorus]
No man, no man
No man, no man
My Confidence is you
What is Hard, what is hard for you
It can never exist oh
